ygData.subject: OOC: Let's Get Organized!

Content-Type: text/plain; charset=UTF-8
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

I started working on updating the web site tonight.  We have a lot of
characters that have gone inactive.  I know that usually when someone is not
active in the group, other players pick up those characters.  I've been
reading through some of our posts over the last two years and I'm noticing
that we're getting really confused with all these locations and characters.
I know I have some core characters that I really enjoy posting for, then I
have some less important characters that I keep posting out of obligation;
I'm noticing other people do this too.

What I think we should do is each come up with a list of the characters we
want to post for, and put aside some of the more minor characters until the
group gets more active and we can manage multiple storylines.  The inactive
characters can remain in the background and we can always bring them back
when we want to.  Additionally, we have some major characters like Hydras
and the Faction leaders that I think people do need to post for.
*(Magicquartz,
don't worry about this since you're just getting started)*

Take a look at this list and see if I'm missing anyone, if you have time
please update your characters:
http://www.wikihost.org/w/nbwrpg_wiki/character_list/  (I'm only halfway
through my updates as of this email)

Action plan:

   - Lord Perseus (Pasificus Maximals) and Lord Razorwing (Silver Wings
   Maximals) should consolidate into one Maximal group and either choose one
   leader, or have co-leaders and let the two factions operate separately but
   in a more cooperative fashion.  I'm going to have Perseus give a call for
   all maximals to get on the shuttle.
   - Iron Skull Predacons with Jotuun have not been really active and there
   really aren't very many members.  We should just leave them as they are and
   not worry about them for now.
   - Bushido Predacons have been inactive for a while, however I started a
   thread with Celeron a few months ago.  I plan to continue that and have him
   investigate the cause of the Tidal Wave which wrecked Atlantis.  We can
   probably also leave the rest of the faction inactive for now.
   - The Watchers, I'm not sure what's going on with this group, members are
   Lord Elder, Deadfur, ?
   - Minions - Since Preston left, nothing has happened with the Minions.  I
   can take over his main minion characters and get the action started again.
   Preston noted that the more he acted as a GM and posted for the minions, the
   more active the group got.  I think we just need a little excitement!
   - Dark Rodimus and Nightlight.  I'm trying to find out more information
   about the status of these two characters.  Would Hydras be more inclined to
   let Nightlight go home now that there's a truce?  This might make a good
   thread, getting back these two characters from Hydras.

Questions!?!  Ideas?

-Krafltos

--0016364ecd8038e061046f34515c
